revised_title: Asymmetric Sound Scattering by Parallel Staggered Plates
tldr: This article examines the effect of staggered plates on the field radiated from a duct when a fundamental traveling mode is excited within it and the scattered field when a plane wave is excited at infinity. The authors present a method for solving the integral equations derived in their previous paper and calculate various physically interesting quantities, such as the variation of energy capture by the duct and the asymmetric radiation pattern from an incident duct mode. They also provide a simple heuristic approximation for the scattering problem.
